resources.string: Do you want to add this book to your library?
May contain content for mature readers. Still want to add it to your Family Library?

Sign in again to access your library.
When you open a book and accessibility is turned on
To add a bookmark, tap the icon in the top-corner of the player
To add a bookmark, tap the top corner of the page
Tap & hold on some text to create highlights and notes
Contact support for help with your account.
"To read this book, download it when you're online."
"We currently don't support sleep timers while casting. Continuing will disable any sleep timers that you have set."
You have a sleep timer set
By uploading your file to Play Books, you can read it any time, anywhere. Uploading may take a few minutes.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
"When you finish a book, put it here. Open the book's menu ⋮ , then mark as finished."

"{devices,plural, =0{Reading of this book is currently refused. Wait a few minutes and then try again. If you still see this message, click the 'Report a problem' link on our Help page.}=1{Concurrent reading of this book is limited to one device or computer and you've reached this limit. Close this book in the other reader, wait a few minutes, then try again.}other{Concurrent reading of this book is limited to # devices or computers and you've reached this limit. Close this book in other readers, wait a few minutes, then try again.}}"
Please update Play Store to enable parental controls
You can still use Play Books to upload and read books that you already own
This book will permanently disappear from your device and anywhere else you access your Google Play library.
"This book will no longer be available on your device or from your Google Play library on any other device. You'll need to upload the file again to read it."
You and all members of your family on Google will lose access to this book, from all devices where you access Play Books.
You will lose access to this book from all devices where you access Play Books. But other members of your family on Google will still have access to it.
View the about page for %1$s in the Play Store
Try opening the book again when you have a connection
The clip stopped playing because the Internet connection was lost.
An Internet connection is needed to play clips.
Unfortunately, the clip stopped playing. Check your Internet connection.
Parts of your offline library are missing and will be downloaded again. This can happen if you remove or erase storage where books were stored.
This book contains content that is not yet supported on this device.
No sample is available for this book, but you can read a description and purchase it in Google Play.
Try opening a web browser while using this same connection or try a different connection
Cannot download books while using this connection
"This book can't be downloaded right now. Try again later."

"{devices,plural, =1{ Downloads of this book are limited to one device and you've reached that limit. Before you can read it here, first you need to remove the book from the other device.}other{Downloads of this book are limited to # devices and you've reached that limit. Before you can read it here, first you need to remove the book from another device.}}"
"You are currently offline. You can still access downloaded books in your library."
You can now read personal documents such as PDFs or ePub files using Google Play Books.
To get started, open an EPUB file from any app and click Upload to Play Books.
When new books are available from authors in your library
When new books are available in series that you read
For books that match your interests
"Available only when you're connected to the Internet. Operator charges may apply."
From downloads, mail or other apps

Connect to the Internet to complete your purchase

Ready to start your next book?

Open details page for next book in series, %1$s
"You can't add new purchases to Family Library until you update this payment method. %1$sFind out more%2$s"
"Your family payment method is invalid. You can't add new purchases to Family Library until your family manager fixes the problem. %1$sFind out more%2$s"
Open the Play Books app and choose an account.
Error reading aloud. You may need to install a Text-To-Speech voice.
Pinch closed to exit full-screen mode and enter skim mode
Rental expired, full price: %2$s, current price: %1$s
Can’t connect. Make sure that Wi-Fi or mobile data is on, then try again.
With Google Play Family Library, you can share your purchased books, movies and more with family members.
This file is too big. The limit is %d MB.
"Couldn't retrieve Google Play books library from Google. Check your Internet connection and try again."
To scroll through the book, use two fingers to drag up or down
Read your book in widescreen. Scroll up and down through pages.
To use Books, you need a Google Account.
Check your Internet connection, then try again.
To hide it, use two fingers to drag up.
Enter a page number from %1$s to %2$s
"Your space to fill with books. Start building your collection now."
Recommended for you. Show more in the Play Store app

"{devices,plural, =1{You've already downloaded this book on another device. To read it offline on this device, remove it from the other device.}other{You've already downloaded this book on # devices. To read it offline on this device, remove it from another device.}}"
{devices,plural, =1{You can download this book for offline reading on # device or only read it online.}other{You can download this book for offline reading on # devices or only read it online.}}
"You can't download this book for offline reading. You may only read it while online."
"You're about to upload this file over a mobile connection. Your operator may charge for data usage."
"Can't play the audio narration for this book. Check your Internet connection."
"You're on page %1$s on this device but page %2$s on your other device. Continue reading from page %3$s?"

"As the sun sets, Night Light gradually filters the blue light from your screen, replacing it with a warm, amber light that's better for reading. Turn it on once, and Night Light will always adjust to the perfect setting."
Discover how to make night-time reading easy on your eyes.
Night Light begins this evening. To turn it off, tap the middle of page, then tap %1$s.
Night Light is on. To turn it off, tap the middle of page, then tap %1$s.
Night Light tints your screen amber at night. This makes it easier to read in dim light.
Your device is offline. Check your Internet connection and try again.
To read offline, download books when you have an Internet connection.
"What will you read next? Visit the shop to add books & free samples now."
Unable to play this section of the audiobook. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
{books,plural, =1{added to your Google Play library}other{added to your Google Play library}}
Download failed. Free up some space.
Download failed. Refresh library to try again.
"Original pages aren't available offline. Switching to flowing text."
"Flowing text isn't available offline. Switching to original pages."
Which samples would you like to add to your library?
Want to start reading? Tell us what you like to read.
%s Choose from genres listed by popularity.
Select samples to add to your library, then select %s.
We can suggest some best-selling books and give you free pages to browse
"You're about to download this book over a mobile or metered network. You may be charged for data usage."
You just finished the sample for
{hours,plural, =0{}=1{1 hr }other{{hours} hrs }}{minutes,plural, =1{1 min}other{{minutes} mins}} left in sample
It looks like another device is %1$s ahead of your current position, recorded on %2$s. Do you want to skip ahead and continue listening from there?
It looks like another device is %1$s ahead of your current position, recorded %2$s ago. Do you want to skip ahead and continue listening from there?
It looks like another device is %1$s behind your current position, recorded on %2$s. Do you want to go back and continue listening from there?
It looks like another device is %1$s behind your current position, recorded %2$s ago. Do you want to go back and continue listening from there?
When you rewind or fast forward, audiobooks begin at a natural starting point instead of the middle of a word
Your listening experience just got better. When you rewind or fast forward, audiobooks begin at a natural starting point instead of the middle of a word.
Adjust playback speed, current speed is %1$d times
Adjust playback speed. Current speed is %1$1.2f times
To leaf through the book, use two fingers to drag left or right
There was an error casting to your device. Please try again.
There was an error loading this book. Please try again.
Tap to move through zoomed pages like this:
Some pages have been omitted from this preview.
Tap on the highlighted text to see additional options.
Stylus default action is set to highlight
Add this book to your finished shelf and remove the download from your device.

Select a book using the menu
Visit the comics section of the Play Store

Read or listen to your favourite books on your phone, tablet or laptop
Shop eBooks, audiobooks, comics and more
To zoom in on bubbles, press a volume key or tap on the %s. Try it in any Marvel or DC collected volume. To give feedback, tap the middle of the page, then tap the [!] icon.
Double-tap a bubble to zoom in for easier reading. To find out more and activate the full Bubble Zoom experience, tap the comic then tap Aa.
To zoom in on bubbles, press a volume key or tap on the %s. To give feedback, tap the middle of the page, then tap the [!] icon.
" %1$s Book info: Book ID: %2$s Page number: %3$s"
Bubble Zoom is on. To turn it off, tap the middle of the page, then tap Aa.

We can suggest some best-selling books. We’ll add a free sample from each one to your library.

"Dictionary will be downloaded when there's an Internet connection"

This chapter will be available after you buy the book
This audiobook uses real chapter titles so that you can easily find your place
To use text-to-speech, tap the menu icon and select %s.
This version of Google Play Books is not compatible with your version of Android. Please uninstall it and then install the current version from the Google Play Store.
To get better accessibility support, please upgrade WebView.
